name: Health
title: Health
level5: Cholera OR Ebola = Confirmed;2 indicators = Confirmed

name: Hunger Severity Shock
title: Hunger Severity Shock
level3: Hunger is the worst or hunger is bad >= 40%
level2: Hunger is the worst or hunger is bad >= 20%

name: Wild Foods Making People Sick
title: Wild Foods In Main Meal and Making People Sick
level5: Wild foods consumed that make people sick >= 60%
level4: Wild foods consumed that make people sick >= 45%
level3: Wild foods consumed that make people sick >= 30%
level2: Wild foods consumed that make people sick >= 15%

name: Only Children Eating
title: Coping Strategy - Adults Skipping Meals for Children to Eat

name: All Day Without Eating
title: Coping Strategy - All Day Without Eating

name: Access to Land & Inputs
title: Access to Land and Agriculture Inputs
level5: No access to land and agricultural inputs >= 50%
level4: No access to land and agricultural inputs >= 35%
level3: No access to land and agricultural inputs >= 20%
level2: No access to land and agricultural inputs >= 10%

name: Crop Production
title: Crop Production
sources: Crop and Food Security Assessment Mission (CFSAM)

name: Live Green Vegetation (NDVI)
title: Live Green Vegetation (NDVI) Coverage
level5: Current NDVI compared to historic average <= 80%
level4: Current NDVI compared to historic average <= 85%
level3: Current NDVI compared to historic average <= 90%

name: Rainfall
title: Change in Rainfall From Long Term Mean
sources: CHIRPs via WFP VAM Dataviz platform
level5: Increase or decrease from long term mean >= 60%
level4: Increase or decrease from long term mean >= 40%
level3: Increase or decrease from long term mean >= 20%
level2: Increase or decrease from long term mean >= 10%

name: Clean Timely & Safe Water
title: Perception of Access to Clean, Timely and Safe Water (CTSW)
level5: Increase between household and settlement level data >= 40%
level4: Increase between household and settlement level data >= 30%
level3: Increase between household and settlement level data >= 20%
level2: Increase between household and settlement level data >= 10%

name: Rainfall
title: Change in Rainfall From Long Term Mean
sources: CHIRPs via WFP VAM Dataviz platform
level5: Increase or decrease from long term mean >= 60%
level4: Increase or decrease from long term mean >= 40%
level3: Increase or decrease from long term mean >= 20%
level2: Increase or decrease from long term mean >= 10%

name: Acute Watery Diarrhoea
title: Acute Watery Diarrhoea (AWD) Caseload and Death Rates

name: Acute Watery Diarrhoea
title: Acute Watery Diarrhoea (AWD) Caseload and Death Rates

name: Global Acute Malnutrition
title: Prevalence of Global Acute Malnutrition (GAM) From Weight for Height Z-score (WHZ)
